channel.title: Plasma on Rahul Rameshbabu
channel.description: Recent content in Plasma on Rahul Rameshbabu

item.title: Speedrunning setting up a plasma-nm development environment
item.description: Why did I set up a plasma-nm development environment in the first place? Why did I want to contribute changes to plasma-nm? If you have peaked at my GitHub profile or activity, you probably know a couple of things about me. I do not use Plasma or GNOME but rather Xmonad. I mostly focus on kernel development and related low-level subjects these days. So why would I bother contributing to plasma-nm?
